message.logs: So many ways to record life, I prefer to do it in my own way, Welcome to my lifeüòé

part1.title: Front End Engineer
part1.content: A Two years working experience front end programmer, I started to get into this industrial in about 5 years ago. So we had a course called 'HTML & CSS Web Design' in college which made me very impressed, I used to wonder how those amazing Web effects were made by codes, and I have to figure it out. That`s the motivation that keeps me moving on.

part2.title: My Hobbies
part2.‚Äòcontent: Besides Coding, Basketball and RollingSkate also fullfill my spare life. I dreamed of being a big Star when I was a kid ü§£but I stop growing taller when I was 18. So I started to try something else to see if I could get a little bit taller, and I bought my first skating shoes , and that changed my whole life..

part3.title: Next Movement
part3.content:
Keep trying and learing new things
Keep challenge my limits and striving for excellence
